__e: My father said your father was going to be appointed Secretary of the Navy until his loyalty was brought under question.
I'm making him Minister of Energy Development, and he tells me he wants to move away.
I've been a good minister can't have a minister who lies to me.
Minister, we don't intend to leave orbit until we prove his innocence.
Sir, we shall now escort you to your hotel.
Mr. Secretary, we need to leave now.
